short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A plugin to export all the numbers you talk to in Whatsapp in excel format

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Export your WhatsApp contacts with ease using the SOFT10 Chrome Extension. After logging in with your username and password, this extension allows you to access your WhatsApp contacts directly from an open web WhatsApp session and export them in Excel format. Streamline your contact management process and save valuable time with this simple and efficient tool.

Key Features:

Easy Login: Access the extension using your SOFT10 username and password.
Seamless Integration: Works directly with your open web WhatsApp session.
Excel Export: Quickly export all your WhatsApp contacts in Excel format with just a click.
Additional Benefits:

SOFT10 also offers a powerful WhatsApp API service, allowing businesses to automate customer interactions, send bulk messages, and integrate WhatsApp into their existing systems. By using this extension alongside SOFT10â€™s API, you can effortlessly manage and interact with your contacts, enhancing your business communication strategy.

Ideal for users who need to manage large contact lists, automate messaging, and leverage advanced API capabilities.
